The 'Queen' buzzed around in the air for a long moment, the sound of
her wings was loud in the chamber as she flew. When Tuscon spoke about
the possibility of attack the buzzing got louder and angrier, as she
poised in the air as if to attack, and then Straightshot spoke up.

> Straight Shot nodds.
>
> "Yeah, C'mon, we're all sick of fighting and maybe just maybe you'll get something in return for being a good sport."

"Oh." the larger insect said, her voices buzzed slightly as she spoke,
"and what do you have to offer the hoard?"

Even as she spoke from some of the caves a popping and then a strange
sort of metal on metal peeling sound could heard although it was
difficult to make out clearly. Also there was shadowy movement that
could be just discerned from the inside of different caves, a very
many different caves!

(TAG)

Preston
